.. _spec-122:

Level 0 FITS Specification
=============================

The Level 0 specification for FITS files is reproduced here for convenience.

The Level 0 data that are archived and made available through the DKIST Data Center will also have some keys from
Spec 214 added to provide some level of standardization between Level 0 and Level 1.

-------------------------------
